Message.Title: AMZN + Blackberry
Message.Msg: Regarding earlier post here on Amazon going for Blackberry: Amazon can afford to buy Blackberry by issuing 53Millionn shares and all stock deal. Every 10 BBRY stock can get 1 AMZN stock. Prem Watsa I think will take it as he will have 50%+ profit. BBRY Board will take it as well I think. Amazon gains 13B immediate revenue, no impact to profits (as Amazon doesn't make profits), Amazon also gains 9B in book value. This could be a 14B acquisition which is 11B net of cash as BBRY has 3.1B in cash. Amazon also get 3.1B free cash in the deal if they go all stock. They also get critical mobile patents, a deeper penetration to cloud, software and service. Bezos might pull this trigger. Makes sense to me
